widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: Justia Webinar:
config.description: Our team is in full gear to host our second Justia Webinar presented by Justia Connect. So we started with the marketing efforts that include, among other things, adding ads to our web properties, updating our client reports and newsletters, and sending multiple blast campaigns.

config.title: Justia Elevate:
config.description: We continue working on new features and resources for our Justia Elevate clients. This month we added more demo sites with new color schemes and updated our Responsive Gallery to feature these new palette combinations.

config.title: IT Maintenances:
config.description: We are currently undergoing a major effort to migrate our full IT infrastructure to a secure environment. This month we migrated resources for major projects such as our Justia Lawyer Directory, Free Law, Justia Ask A Lawyer, Blawgsearch, and other internal tools.
